title: Are cyclists required, by law to stop for stop signs?  Couple of days ago when traveling east on Clear Run Drive in College Aces, a byclist dressed in helmut and full cyclist gear approached Clear Run Drive from Cardinal Drive.  Without even looking the cyclist ran through the intersection, full speed without stopping.  Except for the 25 mph speed limit and a quick reaction on my part,it could have been bad, bad.  Careul cyclists, be alert and use common sense.
text: Cyclists are supposed to obey traffic laws, just like drivers.
